咁又好難做到iPhone x咁喎
用amoled加向內屈線，係好高難度，高階機都未必咁整，中階低階直頭唔洗諗

每款手機的屏幕底部都需要一條與主板連接的數據帶，這就必須預留一塊「下巴」區域。 Apple 的極端解決方案是採用了柔性 OLED 屏幕，在底部向後彎曲，這樣數據帶就被藏在了後面。所以 iPhone X 才會變厚，而且更貴。甚至為 Apple 提供 OLED 屏幕的 Samsung 都不敢這麼設計。所以 Android 手機的 「 下巴 」 短時間內不會消失。
https://www.google.com.hk/amp/s/qooah.com/2018/04/01/why-only-iphone-x-can-do-that/amp/

HMD Global產品總監Juho Sarvikas指出，Google Play內上架的Android應用已經作出優化，即使手機只有4GB內存，運行上已經足夠有餘。再多的內存，對提升運行效能影響不大，反而會帶來成本的壓力。

不過，Juho Sarvikas補充，部分國家或地區如中國大陸對Google Play有限制，其他來源的應用未經優化，會對內存使用量造成很大壓力，使用更大的內存情有可原。

這些膠水起初並不是透明的，而是一種略微泛黃的狀態，由其貼合螢幕後還需要進行一系列程序（比如紫外線照射），對膠水進行固化處理讓它變成「不可見」的狀態。問題來了，出於成本或着急上市的因素，有時工廠會縮減螢幕貼合膠水固化的時間，再加上膠水貼合也存在一定程度的工差，從而出現某一批次手機固化不到位的現象。

iPhone 6時期的「陰陽屏」大都就是未固化的膠水引起的，隨着使用時間的增加（手機發熱加速膠水固化），「陰陽屏」顯現都會有所緩解甚至消失。

用8s又未上到8.1 既可以試試:

The Nokia 8 Sirocco device comes with the Android Oreo 8.0 OS version by default. If you had searched for any new updates on the device after inserting the SIM card for your dedicated service provider, this might be the reason for the delay in receiving the latest Security patch, as well as the 8.1 update version.

One solution to this could simply be to switch the SIM card to that of a different service provider and search for updates on their network provisioning settings.

You need to take into account that, SIM card provisioning will determine the OTA update server access for all network connections on the device, including WiFi, hence this provisioning will most likely need to be changed or deleted.

An additional solution for resolving this issue would be to Factory reset the settings of the device, as that would be the only way to delete your standard SIM card provisioning. Make sure you do not insert a SIM card when setting up the device, prior to searching for updates.

If the updates are not reaching you despite all of this, please confirm your device's IMEI number, which should be written on the side of your handset's box.

We apologize for any inconvenience and the lack of response up to this point
